> <OLD>
>
> Hydras smiled in a malicius way"I'm afraid that I'll refuse to follow you
> alone, I'm not so stupid to do it... At least 3 of my soldiers will follow
> me or Blackout have to come here... I know that you have your orders, but
> remember that seguriy is ffirst and I refuse to take an unecesary risk"

<NEW>

Tankor's shoulder mounted weapon began to hum as he directed power to
it, his optics began to glow fiercly. "You will comply with my orders
or you will be terminated." Tankor said as the other drones also
turned thier weapons on Hydras.

Meanwhile the predacons with Hydras also charged thier weapons and
faced them at the drones. Injector, Buzzclaw, Terrorgator, and
Quickstrike raised thier weapons almost in unison even as Terrorsaur,
Waspinator diud much the same. Tarrantulus looked decidedly nervous as
he spoke quickly into a small radio and pulled out his wwapon. Inferno
stood before Hydras much like a lone bodyguard protecting his master.
"Come any closer and I will show you termination." he said in low
tones to the nearest drone.

"WAIT!" said a voice over a loudspeaker in the chamber they were in,
it sounded like Breakout, the security officer Hydras had spoken with
earlier. "Tankor, stand down. Hydras, I have accepted your offer,
choose your three."

(TAG)

Preston
